user_prompt:
I tried to build a CNN for image classification, but my model gives 98% accuracy on training and only 55% on validation. I used ReLU, dropout, and 3 convolutional layers, and my loss keeps going down.
Is it a good idea to add more layers to fix the validation performance??

feedback.summary: Student recognized overfitting but incorrectly considered adding layers as a solution, missing key fixes like regularization and data augmentation.
Student recognized overfitting but considered adding layers as a solution, missing key fixes like regularization and data augmentation.
The student recognizes overfitting but incorrectly considers adding layers as a solution.
Student seeks help for revision but does not specify weaknesses, requiring a generic response.
